General.Name: Network Media Group Inc
General.Description: Network Media Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and exploits film and television properties. It also provides production services to third parties. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1525 West 8 Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 1T5

6.Name: Mr. Brian  Gersh
6.Title: Pres of Network Entertainment USA & Exec. Producer
